entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this afternoon then clearing. Blowing snow at times this afternoon. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 26 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 40 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 34.
entry.summary: Clear. Blowing snow at times this evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 34. Wind chill minus 39 this evening and minus 45 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Tuesday 10 January 2023
